name: Melanoma Gum Other T
title: Clinical and Pathological T
notes:
**Note 1:**  TNM does not include a Tis category for melanomas of the upper aerodigestive sites (head and neck sites). Tis is mapped to NA and TNM stage group is derived as NA.

**Note 2:**  Mucosal melanomas are aggressive tumors, therefore, T1 and T2 are omitted as are Stages I and II. 

**Note 3:**  Assign T3 for localized tumor when no other information is available or for extension involving the mucosa only of adjacent sites.

**Note 4:**  Assign T4a or T4b for extension involving the deeper tissues of the primary or adjacent sites.
rows:
Unknown; extension not stated
Not documented in patient record
Tumor limited to the epithelium and/or submucosa (mucosal disease)

Tumor confined to mucosa of gum

Extension involving mucosa only:
    Buccal mucosa (inner cheek)
    Labial mucosa (inner lip), lip
    Lateral pharyngeal wall
    Soft palate including uvula
    Tonsillar pillars
    Tonsillar fossae
    Tonsils

Localized, NOS

Stated as T3

Note: T4 has subcategories of T4a and T4b. Assign T4 only when there is no information available to assign one of the subcategories

Stated as T4 [NOS]
Tumor invades deep soft tissue, cartilage, bone or overlying skin

Involvement of deep tissue or periosteum of gum
Involvement of deep tissue of gum plus mucosal involvement 
Involvement of deep soft tissue or musculature 

Bone, NOS except base of skull
Cartilage of mandible or maxilla
Cartilage, NOS
Cortical bone of mandible or maxilla
Cortical bone, NOS
Facial muscle, NOS
Mandible, NOS
Maxillary sinus (antrum)
Maxilla, NOS
Skin of face
Subcutaneous soft tissue of face

Extrinsic muscle of tongue:
    Genioglossus
    Hyoglossus
    Palatoglossus
    Styloglossus

Stated as T4a

Tumor invades any of the following:
Brain
Dura
Skull base
Lower cranial nerves (IX, X, XI, XII)
Masticator space
Carotid artery
Prevertebral space
Mediastinal structures

Contiguous extension:
    Base of skull
    Pterygoid plates  

Further contiguous extension

Stated as T4b
